title: Initial vote on PPWR signals relief for policymakers - Zero Waste Europe
summary: The article discusses the recent ENVI Committee voting on Packaging and Packaging Waste Regulation, highlighting the adoption of reuse and single-use packaging targets, restrictions on single-use packaging sales, and quotas for recycled content in new products.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 813312 - Environment, Conservation and Wildlife Organizations, 562910 - Remediation Services, 562920 - Materials Recovery Facilities, 562111 - Solid Waste Collection
